queries.name: weeklySales
queries.query:
SELECT WEEK(s.entry_date)+1 AS Week, sum(s.sales) AS Sales
            FROM sales s
            WHERE YEAR(s.entry_date) =  :year
            AND MONTH(s.entry_date) = :month
            GROUP BY Week
            ORDER BY Week
queries.comment: returns the sales generated per each week

queries.name: weeklyQuotes
queries.query:
SELECT WEEK(entry_date)+1 AS Week, count(*) AS Quotes
            FROM quotes
            WHERE YEAR(entry_date) =  :year
            AND MONTH(entry_date) = :month
            GROUP BY Week
            ORDER BY Week
queries.comment: returns the quotes made in a month per each week

queries.name: weeklyLeads
queries.query:
SELECT WEEK(entry_date)+1 AS Week, count(*) AS Leads
            FROM leads
            WHERE YEAR(entry_date) =  :year
            AND MONTH(entry_date) = :month
            GROUP BY Week
            ORDER BY Week
queries.comment: returns the leads created per each week

queries.name: weeklyFollowUps
queries.query:
SELECT WEEK(entry_date)+1 AS Week, count(*) AS FollowUps
            FROM follow_ups
            WHERE YEAR(entry_date) =  :year
            AND MONTH(entry_date) = :month
            GROUP BY Week
            ORDER BY Week
queries.comment: returns the follow-ups made in a month

queries.name: leadsCount
queries.query:
SELECT COUNT(*) as LeadsCount
            FROM   leads l, quotes q, reps r
            WHERE q.lead_id = l.id and q.rep_id = r.id and r.channel_type = :channel
queries.comment: returns the count of leads taken over by sales reps in each channel

queries.name: repsCount
queries.query:
SELECT COUNT(*) as RepsCount
            FROM  reps r
            WHERE r.channel_type = :channel
queries.comment: returns the count of sales reps in each channel

queries.name: salesRevenueAndCount
queries.query:
SELECT SUM(sales) as SalesRevenue, COUNT(sales) as TotalSales
FROM sales s,  quotes q, reps r 
WHERE s.quote_id = q.id and q.rep_id = r.id and r.channel_type = :channel
queries.comment: returns the total sales revenue generated & count of sales made per each category of sales reps

queries.name: topTrendingProducts
queries.query:
SELECT p.name as Product, s.sales as Sales
            FROM Products p, Sales s
            WHERE p.id = s.product_id
            AND YEAR(s.entry_date) =  :year
            AND MONTH(s.entry_date) = :month
            ORDER BY Sales DESC
queries.comment: returns the top trending products of the week

queries.name: salesByReps
queries.query:
select r.name Name, count(q.lead_id) Leads, sum(s.sales) Sales
            FROM leads l
            JOIN quotes q on q.lead_id = l.id
            JOIN sales s on s.quote_id = q.id
            RIGHT OUTER JOIN reps r on r.id = q.rep_id
            WHERE r.channel_type = :channel
            GROUP BY Name
            ORDER BY Sales desc, Leads desc
queries.comment: returns the revenue generated per each category of sales representatives

queries.name: salesByChannels
queries.query:
select c.name Channel, ROUND(sum(s.sales)*100/(SELECT sum(sales) FROM sales)) Percent
            FROM sales s
            inner join quotes q on q.id = s.quote_id
            inner join reps r on r.id = q.rep_id
            right outer join channels c on r.channel_type = c.id
            WHERE YEAR(s.entry_date) =  :year
            AND MONTH(s.entry_date) = :month
            group by Channel
queries.comment: returns the sales converted per each channel

queries.name: weeklyConverted
queries.query:
SELECT WEEK(entry_date)+1 AS Week, count(*) AS Sales
            FROM sales
            WHERE YEAR(entry_date) =  :year
            AND MONTH(entry_date) = :month
            GROUP BY Week
            ORDER BY Week
queries.comment: returns the sales converted per each week

queries.name: revenueHeatMap
queries.query:
SELECT usa.name State, sum(s.sales) Sales, count(c.id) Customers, count(l.id) Leads, count(q.id) Quotes
            FROM sales s
            JOIN quotes q ON q.id = s.quote_id
            JOIN leads l ON q.lead_id = l.id
            JOIN customers c ON l.customer_id = c.id
            JOIN states usa ON usa.id = c.state_id
            AND YEAR(s.entry_date) =  :year
            AND MONTH(s.entry_date) = :month
            GROUP BY State
queries.comment: returns the revenue generated in each state in a month

queries.name: customersRatio
queries.query:
SELECT
            CASE
            WHEN is_renewal = TRUE THEN 'Renewal'
            ELSE 'New'
            END Type,
            COUNT(*) Percent
            FROM SALES
            WHERE MONTH(entry_date) = 1 and year(entry_date) = 2014
            GROUP BY Type
queries.comment: returns the leads made per each category of sales reps

queries.name: leadsByChannel
queries.query:
SELECT WEEK(q.entry_date)+1 AS Week, count(*) AS Leads
            FROM quotes q join reps r on q.rep_id = r.id
            WHERE r.channel_type = :channel
            GROUP BY Week
            ORDER BY Week
queries.comment: returns the leads made per each category of sales reps

queries.name: salesByEachRep
queries.query:
SELECT MONTHNAME(s.entry_date) AS MONTHNAME, count(*) AS SALES
            FROM quotes q join reps r on q.rep_id = r.id
            join sales s on s.quote_id =q.id
            WHERE r.id =:id AND YEAR(s.entry_date) = YEAR(CURDATE())
            GROUP BY MONTHNAME
queries.comment: returns the sales made by each representative

queries.name: eachRepCustomerWiseSales
queries.query:
select c.name as CUSTOMER, sum(s.sales) as SALES from
            quotes q join leads l on q.lead_id =l.id
            join customers c on c.id = l.customer_id
            join sales s on s.quote_id = q.id
            where  q.rep_id = :id
            group by c.id
queries.comment: returns each Representative Customer Vs Sales
